document_data.name: Stolyarof's Table Lute
document_data.mainbody: '''Stolyarof's table lute''' was a unique deep-voiced oversized [[lute]] that once belonged to [[Ahndri Stolyarof]] sometime in or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
